'''Anaya''' is a quest-exclusive NPC that appears in the {{Quest|Where Are the Fierce Creatures?}}.

==Location==
<gallery>
NPC Location Anaya.png|Anaya's location
NPC Location Anaya Context.png|Additional context
</gallery>

==Profile==
Based on her clothing, Anaya appears to be a [[Forest Rangers|Forest Ranger]]. She is one of three witnesses who recently saw the [[Shaggy Sumpter Beast|Sumpter Beastlord]]: while she was walking in the [[Dharma Forest]], she saw the creature running towards her and fainted. She was later brought to safety with minor wounds.<ref>{{Ref/Quest|Where Are the Fierce Creatures?}}</ref>

===Appearance===
Anaya has short brown hair pulled back into two pigtails. She wears the dark green clothes of a Forest Ranger.
